thread.title: G.O.O.D. Music To Headline Inaugural Fyre Festival
thread.title_full: G.O.O.D. Music To Headline Inaugural Fyre Festival

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: G.O.O.D. Music To Headline Inaugural Fyre Festival
text:
This spring, the inaugural Fyre Festival will take place at the private island of Fyre Cay in the Bahamas for two weekends. Announced by Kendall Jenner via social media, the festival will be headlined by G.O.O.D. Music -- but the other artists have yet to be specified. Ticket packages can be purchased online, but they don't come at a cheap price. Solo travelers will pay $1,595 USD; pairs will spend $3,195 USD; yacht-owners will be paying $3,394 USD per person. If you're looking for the ultimate VIP experience, groups can rent out an "artist's palace" for $50,000 USD per person.
So hyped to announce my G.O.O.D. Music Family as the first headliners for @fyrefestival. Get tix now at fyrefestival.com. VIP access for my followers... use my promo code KJONFYRE for the next 24 hours to get on the list for the artists and talent afterparty on Fyre Cay. #fyrefestival 
A video posted by Kendall (@kendalljenner) on Jan 4, 2017 at 2:11pm PST 

Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
